# messageBody

**Instance Property**

The message body as a string.

## Declaration

```swift
var messageBody: String? { get }
```

## Getting the Shared Items

- **attachmentFileURLs**: An array of NSURL objects representing the files that were shared.
- **permanentLink**: A permanent URL (permalink) that your app can use to access the post.
